guide.introduction:
Sketchup Model

Note: Model doesn't show the proper bolts for the bearings.

Additional Materials Required:

  • V-Groove Bearings (2)
  • 1/2"x 2.5" Bolts (2)
  • M12x55mm Bolts (4)
  • M12 Nuts (4)
  • Washer, Lock 12mm (8)
guide.introduction_rendered:
Sketchup Model

Note: Model doesn't show the proper bolts for the bearings.

Additional Materials Required:

  • V-Groove Bearings (2)
  • 1/2"x 2.5" Bolts (2)
  • M12x55mm Bolts (4)
  • M12 Nuts (4)
  • Washer, Lock 12mm (8)
Tools
  • Angle grinder
  • Welder
  • Wrench
  • hole puncher

lines.text: Grind off the top of the 12mm bolts so that the head is 1/4” thick or less.
lines.text_raw: Grind off the top of the 12mm bolts so that the head is 1/4” thick or less.

lines.text: This is so that the bolts will not be touching the drawer as it slides in and out.
lines.text_raw: This is so that the bolts will not be touching the drawer as it slides in and out.

lines.text: Punch the holes in the main plates and the spacer plates.
lines.text_raw: Punch the holes in the main plates and the spacer plates.

lines.text: Weld the 1/2" bolts in the center hole, from the bolt head side.
lines.text_raw: Weld the 1/2" bolts in the center hole, from the bolt head side.

lines.text: Assemble the bearings to the plate as shown, with lock washers on each side of the main plate.
